attributes.action: To stop the deverstation of the tory party's so called reform.
attributes.additional_details:
The government say we must live within our means but still allows over 300.000 migrants a year to settle in the UK every year . This is one reason why we are short of home's, our NHS can't cope.our schools are turning into breeding ground for extremist.
So what we want to ask the goverment to do is to think about England for once not every other country. 
We have our own homeless and hungry it's about time the torys helped British ppl.
And also ban 0 hour contract
attributes.background: The current Tory government has caused devastation for the poorest in society for the last 5 years. We cannot afford another 5 years of Tory rule, with the recent welfare reform that will cause nothing but immense poverty in the UK.it was OK for tory generation before but not any longer?

rejection.details: If you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take action, you will need to start a new petition which asks clearly for the action that you would like. This needs to be something that the UK Government or Parliament has the power to do.
